extendedInfo.description: The EMRA ABx Guide is a necessity for any health care professional who rotates in the emergency department. Find antibiotics based on organ system, diagnosis, or organism. Virtually every type of infectious disease is covered for outpatient management and for patients needing admission. Includes everything you've come to love about EMRA's printed guide.The EMRA ABx Guide is an accurate, easy-to-use quick reference guide that will become your lifeline in the emergency department.About Emergency Medicine Residents' Association (EMRA):EMRA promotes excellence in patient care through the education and development of emergency medicine residency trained physicians. EMRA is the oldest and the largest independent resident organization in the world. Founded in 1974, EMRA now has a membership of close to 10,000 residents, medical students, and alumni. For more information about membership or other EMRA publications, contact us at emra@emra.org.

reviews.title: Typo
reviews.comment: Pen G for strep pharyngitis is a 1 time dose, NOT 10 days as the app states!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Content not fitted to screen
reviews.comment: There was a reason I didn\'t buy an iPhone I wanted a big screen. Frustrated that the content is limited to the size of an iPhone screen!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great easy access
reviews.comment: And plenty accurate enough for surgery!
reviews.author: Russell Hyde

reviews.title: Barely usable on high resolution devices
reviews.comment: Poorly designed for high resolution screens, everything is tiny!
reviews.author: Brad Huizenga
